title: Create Media Buy Async Response - Failed
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for create_media_buy when status is 'failed'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the operation failed and no media buy was created.

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy that failed. Required for identifying which operation failed, especially when no media_buy_id exists yet.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining why the operation failed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

errors.suggestion: Use display_300x250_image, display_300x250_html, or display_300x250_generative formats
